channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-1423] Remove Thrift/FB303 headers/src from Hive source tree
item.description:
There is a fair amount of code from the Thrift and fb303 libraries that was
checked into the Hive source tree as part of HIVE-73. This code should be
removed and the odbc driver Makefile should be reworked to depend on the
contents of THRIFT_HOME and FB303_HOME as defined by the user.

item.summary: Remove Thrift/FB303 headers/src from Hive source tree

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Fixed in HIVE-1526 as part of the upgrade to Thrift 0.5.0.
